HowTo.rtf: {\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang4105{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Verdana;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Consolas;}} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\ltrpar\lang9\f0\fs22 All new characters start with a Level 5 Basic Mag.\par The color depends of the chosen outfit.\par \par Mag sometime be found as drop, the color will be randomly chosen.\par \par \b\f1 Normal\par \b0\fs16 Mine 1 \tab : 1/114\par Mine 2 \tab : 1/256\par Jungle East : 1/114\par Mountain : 1/256\par \par \b\fs22 Hard\par \b0\fs16 Mine 1 \tab : 1/114\par Mine 2 \tab : 1/256\par Jungle East : 1/114\par Mountain : 1/146\par \par \b\fs22 VHard / Ultimate\par \b0\fs16 Mine 1 \tab : 1/114\par Jungle East : 1/114\par \f0\fs22\par \b Color Mapping\par \par \b0\fs16 Costume 1-1: Red\par Costume 1-2: Blue\par Costume 1-3: Yellow\par Costume 1-4: Green\par Costume 1-5: Purple\par Costume 1-6: Black\par Costume 1-7: White\par Costume 1-8: Cyan\par Costume 1-9: Brown\par \par Costume 2-1: Orange\par Costume 2-2: Slate Blue\par Costume 2-3: Olive\par Costume 2-4: Turquoise\par Costume 2-5: Fuschia\par Costume 2-6: Grey\par Costume 2-7: Cream\par Costume 2-8: Pink\par Costume 2-9: Dark Green\par \par Costume 3-1: Red\par Costume 3-2: Blue\par Costume 3-3: Yellow\par Costume 3-4: Green\par Costume 3-5: Purple\par Costume 3-6: Black\par Costume 3-7: White\par \par \par \par \par \par \par \par \par \par \b\fs22\par }
